Name: Parisian Cocktail
Ingredients: 20 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich cassis tempered by gin and dry vermouth.
History: A drink created in the 1920s to promote crème de cassis. Recipe adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Parisian Cocktail contains 203 calories
